description: This file contains Jest test cases for the React component 'App', testing rendering and navigation functionality in the HME Camp Logistics Manager project.

methods.name: test('renders HME Camp title')
methods.description: Verifies that the App component renders the main title 'HME Camp'.

methods.name: test('navigates to People when clicking sidebar item')
methods.description: Tests navigation to the 'People' section upon clicking the corresponding sidebar link.

methods.name: test('navigates to Dues when clicking sidebar item')
methods.description: Tests navigation to the 'Dues & Payment' section upon clicking the sidebar link.

methods.name: test('navigates to Calendar when clicking sidebar item')
methods.description: Tests navigation to the 'Calendar' section upon clicking the sidebar link.
